text: This seminar is being held at Shanghai East China Normal University from 7th to 27th May.Prior to their departure the group of principals met the Minister of Education AkilaViraj Kariyawasam at the Ministry.A group of sixteen principals appointed last year left for China to participate in a Seminar for Education Administrators from developing countries to be held in Shanghai for 20 days. This seminar is being held at Shanghai East China Normal University from 7th to 27th May.Prior to their departure the group of principals met the Minister of Education AkilaViraj Kariyawasam at the Ministry.
title: Principals leave for China to attend a seminar
